#summary Soar projects using April.

[http://april.eecs.umich.edu Edwin Olson's April group projects and libraries] are used with some Soar projects. These projects have been recently moved to a new top-level module `aprilsoar`.

= Checkout and Build =

  * First, follow the instructions to check out and build the Semantic Memory branch of Soar. Technically, `aprilsoar` can be used against the trunk or other Soar branches, but the SMem branch will provide the least resistance.
